content: Which famous American author wrote the novel 'The Old Man and the Sea'?

The famous American author who wrote the novel 'The Old Man and the Sea' is Ernest Hemingway. This novel was published in 1952 and is considered one of his most renowned works. It tells the story of an aging Cuban fisherman named Santiago who, after a long period of not catching any fish, hooks onto a massive marlin far out in the Gulf Stream off the coast of Cuba. The novel explores themes of perseverance, honor, and the struggle between man and nature.
